title: Research a Specific Legal Question
description: An associate needs to research case law to answer a specific question: 'What constitutes 'reasonable accommodation' for a religious practice under Title VII in the 9th Circuit?'

tasks.description: Formulate a search query for a legal research database like Westlaw or LexisNexis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an effective search query using Boolean operators and relevant keywords.

tasks.description: Execute the search, filtering for cases within the 9th Circuit Court of Appeals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a list of relevant cases.

tasks.description: Analyze the top 5-10 cases to synthesize a rule and identify the key factors the court considers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the legal test and factors used by the court.

tasks.description: Draft a research memo summarizing the findings, citing the key cases.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a memo that directly answers the partner's question.
